title: Mushoku Tensei Redundancy - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Clever Protagonist   Family   Magic   Polygamy   R-15   Reincarnation
author: Rifujin na Magonote   理不尽な孫の手
description:
Taking place after the main events of Mushoku Tensei, these side stories focus on slice of life and Rudeus’ day to day activities after the main work.

Side stories of Mushoku Tensei that tell stories prior to the epilogue of the main series.>
